gui

Class GUIElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GUIElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectionalPad, GridGui, GUIButton, Inventory, Label, Message, SquareGUI

    public abstract class GUIElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Represents a GUI element.
